title: The Wall Street Journal: Some of FirstEnergy’s power-generating affiliates file for chapter 11 bankrputcy
text:
FirstEnergy Corp. placed a fleet of power-generation businesses into chapter 11 bankruptcy, underscoring the financial pressures on the nation’s coal and nuclear power-plant operators.
The Saturday chapter 11 filing in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Akron, Ohio, covers FirstEnergy Solutions Corp., which sells power to retail and wholesale customers primarily in the Midwest and mid-Atlantic regions of U.S.
